devdoc.author: Team: Jessica Marshall, Ashoka Finley
devdoc.details: This contract must be initialized with the address of a valid HyphaToken, ProjectRegistry, and PLCR Voting contract

burnReputation(uint256).details: Only callable by the ProjectRegistry contract

calculateWeightOfAddress(address).details: Returns an average of the token staking and reputation staking to understand the relative influence of a staker
calculateWeightOfAddress(address).return: The relative weight of a staker as a whole integer

claimTask(address,uint256,bytes32,uint25.details: Requires the reputation of msg.sender to be greater than the reputationVal of the task

freezeContract().details: Freezes the contract and allows existing token holders to withdraw tokens

init(address,address,address).details: Quasi contstructor is called after contract is deployed, must be called with hyphaToken, projectRegistry, and plcrVoting intialized to 0

params._stakingPeriod: Length of time the project can be staked before it expires

register().details: Has no sybil protection, thus a user can auto generate accounts to receive excess reputation.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

stakeReputation(address,uint256).details: Prevents over staking and returns any excess reputation staked.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params._newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

unfreezeContract().details: Unfreezes the contract and allows existing token holders to withdraw tokens

unstakeReputation(address,uint256).details: Require reputation to be unstaked to be greater than 0

updateHyphaToken(address).details: Update the address of the hyphaToken

params._newHyphaToken: Address of the new distribute token

updatePLCRVoting(address).details: Instantiate a new instance of plcrVoting contract

params._newPlcrVoting: Address of the new plcr contract

updateProjectRegistry(address).details: Update the address of the base product proxy contract

params._newProjectRegistry: Address of the new project contract

params._prevPollID: The nonce of the previous poll. This is stored off chain
params._secretHash: Secret Hash of voter choice and salt

devdoc.title: Reputation Registry for Distribute Network

averageBalance().notice: Return the average reputation balance of the network users

burnReputation(uint256).notice: Burn reputation in event of project failure

calculateWeightOfAddress(address).notice: Calculates the relative weight of an `_address`. Weighting is calculated by the proportional amount of both reputation and tokens that have been staked on the project.

claimTask(address,uint256,bytes32,uint25.notice: Claim a task at index `_index` from project at `_projectAddress` with description `_taskDescription` and weighting `_weighting`

proposeProject(uint256,uint256,bytes).notice: Propose a project of cost `_cost` with staking period `_stakingPeriod` and hash `_ipfsHash`, with reputation.

refundProposer(address).notice: Refund a reputation proposer upon proposal success, transfer 1% of the project cost in wei as a reward along with any reputation staked.

refundStaker(address).notice: Refund a reputation staker from project at `_projectAddress`

refundVotingReputation(uint256).notice: Withdraw voting rights from PLCR Contract

register().notice: Register an account `msg.sender` for the first time in the reputation registry, grant 10,000 reputation to start.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

rescueTokens(address,uint256).notice: Rescue unrevealed reputation votes from expired polls of task at `_index` of project at `_projectAddress`

rewardTask(address,uint256).notice: Reward the claimer of a task that has been successfully validated.

voteCommit(address,uint256,uint256,bytes.notice: First part of voting process. Commits a vote using reputation to task at index `_index` of project at `projectAddress` for reputation `_reputation`. Submits a secrect hash `_secretHash`, which is a tightly packed hash of the voters choice and their salt

voteReveal(address,uint256,uint256,uint2.notice: Second part of voting process. Reveal existing vote.

userdoc.notice: This contract manages the reputation balances of each user and serves as the interface through which users stake reputation, come to consensus around tasks, claim tasks, vote, refund their stakes, and claim their task rewards. This contract also registers users and instantiates their accounts with 10.000 reputation
